title: Question 14
prompt:
Sentence 5: As we discussed, I am eager to move into the toy industry, and this opportunity seems a perfect fit.

The most effective division of sentence 5 into two sentences would include which words?
description: Click the <u>one best answer</u> to each question.
feedback:
This question requires rewriting one sentence as two sentences. The sentence that needs to be rewritten is a compound sentence made up of two independent clauses.
As we discussed, I am eager to move into the toy industry, and this opportunity seems a perfect fit.
Each independent clause can stand as a sentence on its own. To create two sentences, remove the comma and the word and. End the first sentence with a period and start the second sentence with a capital letter. The second sentence begins, “This opportunity.”
As we discussed, I am eager to move into the toy industry. This opportunity seems a perfect fit.
